article_text: YouVisit began as a college startup that offered virtual college campus tours. But now the Aventura company has expanded into several industries, adapted its technology for VR headsets and now offers a build-your-own tour option.

article_metadata.news-keywords: YouVisit, YouVisit.com, Abi Mandelbaum, Taher Baderkhan, Endri, Tolka Virtual Guided Walking Tour, Oculus, virtual reality, college tours
article_metadata.title: YouVisit expands from virtual college tours into hospitality, real estate | Miami Herald

article_summary:
YouVisit began as a college startup that offered virtual college campus tours.
But now the Aventura company has expanded into several industries, adapted its technology for VR headsets and now offers a build-your-own tour option.
